<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper struct to parse and store a memory address as base + index + offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We ignore sign extensions when it is safe to do so.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The following two expressions are not equivalent. To differentiate we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to store whether there was a sign extension involved in the index</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// computation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  (load (i64 add (i64 copyfromreg %c)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                 (i64 signextend (add (i8 load %index)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                      (i8 1))))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (load (i64 add (i64 copyfromreg %c)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                (i64 signextend (i32 add (i32 signextend (i8 load %index))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                         (i32 1)))))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/baseindexoffset"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/baseindexoffset/#a374faeeff146333ad33a11b1e6b2e1dc">BaseIndexOffset</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Base;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Index;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;int64&#95;t&gt; Offset;</span></CodeLine>
